docs.snippet: With Britain struggling to integrate minorities, Sadiq Khan is favored to win election on Thursday, which would make him the first Muslim to lead the city and give a boost to his opposition party....
docs.lead_paragraph: With Britain struggling to integrate minorities, Sadiq Khan is favored to win election on Thursday, which would make him the first Muslim to lead the city and give a boost to his opposition party.
docs.abstract: London's mayoral race between Sadiq Khan and Zac Goldsmith pits vastly different candidates against each other, leading to policies being overshadowed by personality; so far Khan has been named projected favorite and would become first Muslim to lead city if he wins.

headline.main: Muslim’s Labour Party Candidacy Shapes London Mayoral Race
headline.print_headline: Muslim’s Bid Shapes London Mayoral Race

docs.snippet: The firebrand leader of South Africa's Economic Freedom Fighters on Saturday launched his party's campaign for what are expected to be closely-fought local elections, promising to rescue voters from poverty, unemployment and corrupt government....
docs.lead_paragraph: The firebrand leader of South Africa's Economic Freedom Fighters on Saturday launched his party's campaign for what are expected to be closely-fought local elections, promising to rescue voters from poverty, unemployment and corrupt government.

headline.main: Firebrand Malema Rallies South Africa's Poor Pledging Land, Jobs, Wifi
headline.print_headline: Firebrand Malema Rallies South Africa's Poor Pledging Land, Jobs, Wifi

docs.snippet: German left-wing demonstrators clashed with police on Saturday as they tried to break up the first full conference of the anti-immigration party Alternative for Germany where Chancellor Angela Merkel's policies came under attack....
docs.lead_paragraph: German left-wing demonstrators clashed with police on Saturday as they tried to break up the first full conference of the anti-immigration party Alternative for Germany where Chancellor Angela Merkel's policies came under attack.

headline.main: Merkel Under Attack at Anti-Immigration Rally Marred by Left-Wing Clashes
headline.print_headline: Merkel Under Attack at Anti-Immigration Rally Marred by Left-Wing Clashes

docs.snippet: Former Gov. Pete Wilson of California used a surprise appearance before the state’s Republican convention Saturday to endorse Senator Ted Cruz, warning that the nomination of Donald J. Trump could lead to political ruin for the party’s candida...
docs.abstract: Former Gov. Pete Wilson of California used a surprise appearance before the state’s Republican convention Saturday to endorse Senator Ted Cruz, warning that the nomination of Donald J. Trump could lead to political ruin for the party’s candidates this November.

headline.main: Pete Wilson of California Backs Ted Cruz and Warns of Donald Trump
